body:
School conjuration (healing)

Level alchemist 3, bard 3, cleric 3, druid 4, inquisitor 3, paladin 4, ranger 4, witch 4

Duration instantaneous

Saving Throw Will half (harmless) or Will half

Spell Resistance yes (harmless)

Target Restrictions personal, selected

The target of a wordspell with this effect word is cured of 3d6 points of damage + 1 point per caster level (maximum +15). Undead are damaged by this effect word, but can attempt a Will save for half damage and spell resistance as normal.
name: Greater Cure
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Words of Power/Effect Words/Healing Words/Greater Cure

sections.body: The target is cured of 3d8 points of damage + 1 point per caster level (maximum +15).
sections.name: Boost
